Miracards.name: Free Prescription Delivery
Miracards.discription: Free delivery across the city to your home, work place or longâ€“term care facility.

Miracards.name: Consultations
Miracards.discription: Professional opinion and advice on your health condition, medications, vaccines and lifestyle modification.

Miracards.name: Insurance Claim Processing
Miracards.discription: Electronic claim submission to your third party pay or coordination with insurance companies for coverage for medical supplies and equipment.

Miracards.name: Diabetic Supplies
Miracards.discription: All the supplies you need to monitor and record your blood sugar are available at our pharmacy. Plus, free blood sugar testing at the pharmacy at any time.

Miracards.name: Home Care Supplies
Miracards.discription: Supplies required for your independence, health and wellness needs can be ordered for you.

Miracards.name: Compliance Packaging Available
Miracards.discription: To assist patents with self administration and managing a large number of medications and to improve adherence.

Miracards.name: Compounding & Personalized Medications
Miracards.discription: In compliance with the new compounding guideline by Alberta College of pharmacy.

Miracards.name: Supports & Braces
Miracards.discription: Supports, braces and other devices to restrict or assist body movement. We also offer Ostomy supplies to help you with your Ostomy care.

Miracards.name: Compression Stocking
Miracards.discription: Certified fitter on site to address your request for compression stocking for medical reasons or travel purposes.
